      • TestOgre

        public TestOgre(int newX,
                int newY,
                boolean moveClub)
        Creates a TestOgre in preferred x and y values TestOgre starts with. This TestOgre can be allowed(or not) to move its Weapon.
        Parameters:
        newX - the location coordinate
        newY - the location coordinate
        moveClub - the flag indicating Weapon movement
